name: Lionel
smallSnopsies: Lionel is a Pokémon Trainer from the Galar region. He is the Champion of the Galar region and is known for his powerful Charizard Gigamax.
bigSnopsies: Lionel is a Pokémon Trainer from the Galar region. He is the Champion of the Galar region and is known for his powerful Charizard Gigamax.
